OK, I love NTR. I dig this shit. From light novels to games to fucking hentai, but damn do I fucking hate it when an NTR story is so boring and unpassionately made. YOU WOULDN'T GET FUCKING RAPED IF YOU SHOUT BEFORE THAT IN THE FIRST PLACE. You'll place this two-faced idiotic student to prison for good, giving his victims some peace, but no she can't shout because what?? cuz she will be known as someone who got raped?? what? SHOUT THEN. Many victims of rape are placed on shitty situations resulting in rape, drugs, blackmail, held captive. But girl u can stop this why don't you? I bet an honor student who was actually a fuckboy would gain more attention than someone who got sexually harassed. The art is good but damn this kind of story is just lame.

She didn't try to escape either. So what if someone caught them?, she could of easily said it was rape.  This is hella boring.  I hate when they do nothing  and expect you to feel anything for them. This isn't even sexy. Maybe for you guys  this get you off but for me it's doing NOTHING.

Complaining about tags that are clearly laid out at the beginning. When you see a tag you don't like... click away. 
I can't get off to loli or shota, so when I stumble upon something with those tags, I click away and find something else. I don't get angry and scroll all the way to the comment section to insult those who read it.

I'm not one to dislike just for being generic but I could barely keep track of what was happening. It went from semi-coherent to totally incoherent and all I understood by the end was she didn't want people to know he was forcing himself on her so she kept quiet? Idk, it just makes no sense for her to not shout just for that reason. It could have at least tried to be more generic and give a more understandable explanation of fear or initial blackmail. The girl is thicc in some parts I guess but the story throws me off too much and there isn't even enough good lewds in it to redeem it from being terrible Imo.
